coded_answer.p: I'm surprised to read that I've won the first prize. So I wouldwill travel onin July because I've got onlyonly got some therethen free timefree time then. I've got a lot of work and my boss didn't allowedwon't allow me to leave my jobwork at any other time.

I would prefer to stay in a tent because it's more like a camp. And so I can I be better in touch with thecloser to nature. I'm happy to read that I will have the chance to do two activities there. I chosechoose painting and photography. I like painting and I have talent,. I could paint all the day. Photography is a relaxing activity. You can photograph all kindkinds of arts you want. I take very good photos!
I wouldmust ask you about clothes and money. What kind of clothes should I bring with me? And what about money? Do you pay for alleverything? And for food, drinks etc?
I'm looking forward to hearing news from you.

We people are often depressed or havesuffer from stress. What are we doingdo we do then? We go shopping. That makes oftenoften makes women feel better. They go out with friends or alone. But shopping is not always enjoyable.

A friend of mine was depressed because her friendboyfriend leaveleavesleft her. She phonephonesphoned me and asked me what about going shopping. I suggestagreeagreed and we went shopping. In the timeJust as we wantwanted to go out of a shop a man stopped us and holdholdsheld a pistol in his hand. We were scared and so we did alleverything whatthat he told us to do.
